SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Start the Sia node automatically when Sia Mobile is started. Otherwise, you can use the 'Start' button on its notification.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Start Sia automatically

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Keep your phone's CPU awake when the Sia node is running, even while your phone is locked, so that the Sia node can continue operating (syncing, downloading, etc).
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Keep CPU awake for Sia

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Sia will store its data on whatever your phone returns as its external storage - this is manufacturer-dependent, and will not necessarily be an SD card.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Use external storage

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Changes will apply on next restart.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Dark mode

com.vandyke.siamobile.ui.settings.IntEdi.android:summary: The number of decimal places displayed. This does not affect actual precision of values in memory, which is exact. When displayed, they will be rounded up.
com.vandyke.siamobile.ui.settings.IntEdi.android:title: Displayed decimal precision

ListPreference.android:summary: The screen to load to when Sia Mobile launches.
ListPreference.android:title: Launch screen

Preference.android:summary: You can clear all of Sia Mobile's data from here, such as the blockchain. WARNING: this will delete ALL of Sia Mobile's data, including any wallet files. Write down your seed(s) first.
